reviews.title: Status quotes for facebook
reviews.comment: Love the app but can\'t post to facebook. Shows blank. Would love to have this fixed. HTC G2 with google
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My android
reviews.comment: Great stufffffff.... i fancy ths app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is a bunch off bukkshyt u have to remember  thus shyt urself it wont post on status its fkn bkank MORON
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome wacky quotes
reviews.comment: Excellent collection. Though most of the quotes are available on net, what this app does is, it makes them available together. Simple to use, and post.  Beware ~ you may just burst out laughing all of sudden after coming across a super hilarious n witty liner. Njoy folks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome...
reviews.comment: This app is simply awsome..i loved it....all the status are going in ur favourite section..... :P
reviews.author: Umang Agarwal

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Funny status ideas to keep your friends laughing. Luv it, use it on my FB page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MeOw...:-*
reviews.comment: Diz app sucks... Der r no funy quotes.... Its ol rubish...dnt install diz app... Der r nly 261 quotes vich r yakkkkk....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: I love. Most all Facebook status I\'ve been looking for ideas for my Facebook so it helped. Out a lot

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Nice so far

reviews.comment: Love this app!

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t have wat it says it has. . Only a couples of good status... uninstall! !

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: It wont post to FB without me typing it in. Some r funny some are just stupid. Not worth the time . Uninstalling.

reviews.comment: Love this app   great   job

reviews.title: Tiffany
reviews.comment: OMG so love this application an it actually posts to your Fb wall unlike the others I have tried in the past! Thank you so much!!!

reviews.comment: I Think This App Is Sorta Cool But The Statuses Are Really Violent ...:/

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Good concept but when you click to upload, the status doesn\'t copy and you have to retype it yourself. Please fix.

reviews.title: Good

reviews.comment: Has some pretty good stuff and its free. Wayy better than the one I bought!
